{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00477v1", "title": "Orbit-blocking words in free groups", "summary": "By strengthening known results about primitivity-blocking words in free
groups, we prove that for any nontrivial element w of a free group of finite
rank, there are words that cannot be subwords of any cyclically reduced
automorphic image of w. This has implications for the average-case complexity
of Whitehead's problem.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR,cs.CC", "published": "2025-05-01T12:09:19Z"}
